info.description: Use the Ticketmaster Commerce API to look up available offers and products on various platforms, including Ticketmaster's and TicketWeb's. Once offers and products are selected, you can use the API to cart and transact on those items.
info.title: Commerce API

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer

parameters.name: api-key
parameters.description: Query Param API Key for external API developer

post.description:
Method: POST. Authentication required.
This operation allows users to add products to a cart.
a number of items for an offer of a product.
a number of items for an offer in specific areas.
a number of items for an offer in a specific price range.
a specific set of inventory items (i.e. seats).
This operation returns a new cart.

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer

delete.description:
Method: DELETE. Authentication required.
This operation empties the cart.
This operation returns the updated cart.

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer

patch.description: This operation allows to update customer's info

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer

patch.description:
Method: PATCH Authentication required.
This operation allows users to add deliveries to a cart.
all items in a cart.
all items in a reservation.
all items in a specified set of inventory item groups.
a set of specified inventory items.
This operation returns the updated cart including delivery information.

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer

patch.description:
Method: PATCH Authentication required.
This operation allows users to add one or more payments to a cart.
This operation returns a cart with the selected payment(s).

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer

patch.description:
This operation allows users to add or remove products to/from a cart.
This operation supports add products in the same ways as the Create Cart Operation.
all items in a reservation.
all items in a reservation for a specific product.
all items in a specified set of inventory item groups.
a set of specified inventory items.
This operation returns the updated cart.

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer

post.description:
Method: POST. Authentication required.
This operation allows users to complete cart purchase.
This operation returns an order confirmation response.

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer

get.description: This operation returns available payment options plus information about deliveries

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer

get.description: This operation returns available payment options

parameters.name: X-SSL-CERT-UID
parameters.description: API Key for external API developer
